sub_text.1: Help people in need whenever and wherever you want, having access whenever necessary through chat.
sub_text.2: The chatbot answers questions regarding the assistance of partner restaurants with people in socially/economically vulnerable situations.
text_onboard.3: Help people in need by connecting with partner restaurants
sub_text.3: Connecting people in situations of social/economic vulnerability with partner restaurants, reducing food waste and helping people in need
